name: Block Arena (itch)
description:
Block Arena

Blocks are falling down on you: avoid them or you're dead. You can shoot the blocks to free some space. If you run out of ammo, use the "tackle" attack instead. You can refill ammo by looting the yellow blocks. 

Single PlayerLocal MultiplayerEnter your name on the start screen (top-left hand corner). Try to reach the 1st place in the online leaderboard. Your score depends on how many blocks you destroy.If there is more than one player, you can get items in blue blocks to attack the other players.  Also, after you die, you can drop blocks on your opponents (Left click/RB). Try to be the last survivor! Controls (controller) displayed in-game. Controls (mouse/keyboard):

  • WASD: Move
  • Left click: Shoot (towards the cursor)
  • WASD + Right click: Tackle
  • E: Use item (only in multiplayer, for items in blue blocks)
  • Esc/Enter: Pause
Additional info
  • If you have some framerate/performance issues in fullscreen mode,  download the Windows version. 
  • To remove or add players, pause the game and click on the "Main menu" button to return to the start screen. (Careful: if you click or use the keyboard, a player will be assigned to the mouse/keyboard)
